_source.short_desc: Capitalize on customer insight, improve front-line efficiency and effectiveness, streamline critical business processes.
_source.long_desc: Make the most of relationships with customers by capitalizing on customer insight, improving front-line efficiency and effectiveness,streamlining critical business processes across and beyond customer touch points, and quickly adapting to changing business and customer needs.
_source.pricing_details:
The solution is offered on a subscription payment model and varies depending on your requirements.

SAP offers small business pricing options.
_source.target_audience: Marketing, sales and customer service teams in any size organization.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Calendar/Reminder System
category_features.definition: Notifications/alerts for upcoming events or tasks

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Document Storage
category_features.definition: Store documents in a centralized location for easy access

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Internal Chat Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with real time communication tools like Slack, etc.

category_features.name: Lead Generation
category_features.definition: Manage the process of attracting and converting people into leads

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Integrate with marketing automation tools

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Create and send a quote or proposal to a customer

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Territory Management
category_features.definition: Organize customer data and accounts by user or geography

category_features.name: Case Management
category_features.definition: Work on a set of tasks related to a particular charge, patient, legal issue or any other complex entity or process

category_features.name: Corrective and Preventive Actions (CAPA)
category_features.definition: Investigate and take action at root cause or error in products/processes to prevent recurrence of the same error

category_features.name: Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Collecting and analyzing feedback/reactions from end-users

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Social Media Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track activity on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

category_features.name: Customer Segmentation
category_features.definition: Process of dividing customers into groups based on common characteristics such as gender, interests, buying habits, or demographic

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Knowledge Management
category_features.definition: Gather, organize, share, and analyze knowledge in terms of resources, documents, and people skills

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Data Collection
category_features.definition: Collect information from multiple sources

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

category_features.name: Survey/Poll Management
category_features.definition: Create and administer polls and surveys

category_features.name: Text Analysis
category_features.definition: Process of extracting and classifying information from text, such as tweets, emails, product reviews, etc

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

category_features.name: Appointment Management
category_features.definition: Schedule, change or cancel appointments

category_features.name: Call Center Management
category_features.definition: Manage all call center activities including call monitoring, call recording, call answering, call transfer, etc.

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Sort and organize large volumes of inbound emails.

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Queue Management
category_features.definition: Monitor wait time and abandonment for incoming requests that have not been routed

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Virtual Assistant
category_features.definition: AI program that learns to perform repetitive data-driven actions such as content or product recommendation, chat automation, etc.

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Lead Capture
category_features.definition: Automatically identify and save contact information for potential customers

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Lead Segmentation
category_features.definition: Divide leads into buckets based on predefined criteria and routing rules

category_features.name: Pipeline Management
category_features.definition: Tracking the effectiveness and configuring volume of sales channels

category_features.name: Prospecting Tools
category_features.definition: Identify potential leads based on predefined criteria and adding them to sales pipeline

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Strategic Planning
category_features.definition: At a high level, visualize a preferred outcome, define goals and identify specific steps to achieve them

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Scoring
category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.name: Data Enrichment
category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.name: Demographic / Firmographic Data
category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

similar_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

similar_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
similar_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.
